channel.title: Welcome Screen
channel.description:
My welcomescreen flickers on and off for some reason, it never flickers until i tried to delete it, all i did was put // infront of some stuff and it didnt work so i took away the // and it flickers.
heres my clients client.java
http://pastebin.com/bEciFbuS
please help me ;D
